title: Samsung confirms Android 12L is coming to tablets, such as the Galaxy Tab S8
content:
Android 12L is Google’s next “big” update for the platform, and it’s focused on improving the experience for bigger screens, including foldables and tablets. Alongside the launch of its Galaxy Tab S8 series today, Samsung has officially confirmed that Android 12L is coming to the company’s tablets … eventually.

more…

The post Samsung confirms Android 12L is coming to tablets, such as the Galaxy Tab S8 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has confirmed that Android 12L will eventually come to the company's tablets such as the newly-launched Galaxy Tab S8 series.
